reviews.text: Mercat Port Antic is located in an excellent spot, right by the waters edge. We would not go out of our way to visit this Market, as it  is a market full of stalls selling old things that you probably would  find anywhere. Some things might be of good value, others, who knows. But it would be of some interest to just walk through and just look.

Voyages to Antiquity docked in Port Vell on a Thursday so, I'll go out on a limb and say this is not a weekends-only event.  How fun!  How eclectic!  Barcelona's residents cleaned out their attics and brought it all here for us to buy.  Or at least peruse.  

Need a military hat?  How about buttons or pins?  Memorabilia?  If there's a collector out there of obscure items, I do believe this would be fertile hunting grounds.
